mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN PD_TAG1 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%') THEN PD_TAG1 WHEN PD_TAG2 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%') THEN PD_TAG2 WHEN PD_TAG3 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%') THEN PD_TAG3 WHEN PD_TAG4 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%') THEN PD_TAG4 WHEN PD_TAG5 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%') THEN PD_TAG5 ELSE NULL END AS recommend_tag FROM product WHERE PD_TAG1 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%') OR PD_TAG2 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%') OR PD_TAG3 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%') OR PD_TAG4 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%') OR PD_TAG5 LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyWord}, '%');
